original_text: We found some believers in the city. So we stayed with them for a week. The Holy Spirit showed these believers that trouble would come to Paul in Jerusalem. So they said to him, ‘Paul, you should not to go to Jerusalem.’
korean_text: 제자들을 찾아 거기서 이레를 머물더니 그 제자들이 성령의 감동으로 바울더러 예루살렘에 들어가지 말라 하더라

sentences.original_text: We found some believers in the city.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그 도시에서 어떤 신자들을 만났습니다.

sentences.original_text: So we stayed with them for a week.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리는 그들과 함께 일주일 동안 머물렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: The Holy Spirit showed these believers
that trouble would come to Paul in Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘에서 바울에게 환난이 닥쳐올 것이라는 것을.

sentences.original_text: ‘Paul, you should not to go to Jerusalem.’
